about_the_game:
Welcome to BattleWars!

An in development online casual shooter where you can play how you want on a variety of gamemodes such as team deathmatch, capture the flag, free for all, zombie defense, etc.

Progress as you play

Earn xp, money and level up to unlock more cosmetics and weapons with cool perks and drawbacks.

Create and join servers

You can create your own server for players to join or join already existing ones in the server browser.

Create and watch demos

Use the replay editor to record, edit and publish your own demos!

Custom community content

Use the BattleWars Mod Kit to create your own maps, gamemodes and more!

content_descriptors.notes: There's blood in the game but it's in a simple styled way such as red cubes
